metadata.title: CVE-2025-0306 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Ruby. The Ruby interpreter is vulnerable tothe Marvin Attack. This attack allows the attacker to decrypt previouslyencrypted messages or forge signatures by exchanging a large number ofmessages with the vulnerable service.

criterions.comment: jruby package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
ruby2.7 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
